title: I wish the SR Update never happened.

replies.body:
It's a sign: the RNG gods have chosen you, among the ranks of millions of League of Legends players, to become the next Scarra. You must take up this mantle, and save us all from the plagues of the savage mobbing "twelveyearold-ians", the mindless "rage-heads", and the cruelly pseudo-intelligent "DotA-lings"

And in case anyone gets offended, this is a joke (well maybe not the "rage-heads" part)
illuminatee confurmed
{{champion:27}} They've discovered us...
hey guys theres a magic pixel in both red bushes outside the base gates if you get it just right your ward wont give any vision itll just be between the bush and the wall try it

Those are in bushes all over the place.  

This may be a different problem, but it's still slightly related...  A few days ago my friend dropped a pink ward in the bush between purple-side blue buff and the river.  It was close to the wall near the edge of the bush, but we still had vision of the area in and around the bush.  Or so we thought...  Only after I walked into the bush was an enemy ward revealed.  It had been in the middle of the bush the whole time, but was somehow not revealed by the pink ward my team put down.
I love when I ward a bush, walk into it and find a pink ward.

ya it annoys me to no end as well....mouse arrow says its in bush, but its not.... haha! 

wasted ward
There is a mastery point in the first line of utility tree that would like to meet you.
that ward used to be possible but now because of the SR update it's impossible UNLESS you use your trinket and have the mastery "Scout"
doesnt work even with scout tried it doesnt work anymore the ward is in the bush but still novision in the bush i think its intended to kill the scarra ward.
You are wrong... with the scout mastery you don't even have to try to get it in there the range of your trinket ward IS LITERALLY big enough to reach the bush
tried it doesnt work.
But... Your wrong...
well i tried and it doesnt so i gave up on it wasted 16 wards so no it doesnt for all thats worth
pretty sure that is a bug, not a SR update feature
That ward has always been hard to place. Look up "Scarra ward fail" on youtube and you should find it

I've had it work a grand total of once since the update, and I did it on accident as the jungler (meaning no scout mastery). I think the placement is just way more picky since that portion of the wall was made a bit thicker towards the bush but the sides are thin comparatively.
Rip sign, you prevented much Scarra-ing
lol, you bad, I can get that ward easy

riot fucked the mesh even though they say they didn't.
You can get stuck on walls and shit a lot easier now.
Couple that with new minion hitboxes and we all love rito more.
thanks rito.
